title: Can Ryze get a re-work anytime soon?
body: Hey, I started playing league a while ago about a year ago i'd say. I started league of legends with Warwick and then you guys gave him a rework, but not yet Ryze. I've recently mained Ryze, and well its hard and it's sad because he has so much potential. Please consider a re-work for one of my favorite champions in the game.

replies.body:
Not sure if troll po-

Yeah.
not sure if troll post or not{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
hes had a shit ton of them already find another champion riot cant fix him
Let's give him his 20th literal rework.
he should get his annual rework soon, dw
